name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Flutter Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in cross-platform development utilizing **Flutter** and **Dart**, along with modern architecture patterns such as **BLoC**, **Cubit**, and **Clean Architecture**. I am proficient in developing responsive and user-friendly applications that leverage **RESTful APIs** for seamless data integration.

My background includes a strong understanding of **Atomic Design** principles and tools such as **GoRouter** and **Mocktail** for efficient UI management and testing. With excellent debugging skills and a commitment to quality, I ensure robust applications that meet high standards. 

In addition to my Flutter expertise, I have extensive experience in software development methodologies, fostering effective communication and teamwork within agile environments. My prior roles also included building high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, with a focus on compliance standards.
